line.originaltext: 6 1/4 cups cubed whole wheat bread
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "6 1/4 cups cubed whole wheat bread")

line.originaltext: 1 1/4 cups milk
1 egg, beaten
1/3 cup butter, softened
3/4 cup raisins
1/4 cup dried mixed fruit
1/2 cup brown sugar
1 tablespoon ground nutmeg
1 tablespoon ground cinnamon
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
In a large bowl, combine bread and milk, and set aside to soak for 5 minutes.
In a large bowl, combine bread and milk, and set aside to soak for 5 minutes.
In a large bowl, combine bread and milk, and set aside to soak for 5 minutes.
In a large bowl, combine bread and milk, and set aside to soak for 5 minutes.
Then stir in egg, butter, raisins, mixed fruit, brown sugar, nutmeg, and cinnamon.
line.annotation: combine({ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5, ing6, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing10, "pudding mix", "stir in")

line.originaltext: Mix well.
Press the mixture into a 9-inch square baking pan.
Press the mixture into a 9-inch square baking pan.
Bake in preheated oven until golden and firm to touch, about 35 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing11, t0, ing12, "baked pudding", "bake until golden and firm to touch, about 35 minutes")

line.originaltext: Leave in baking pan to cool, then cut into squares.
Leave in baking pan to cool, then cut into squares.
Leave in baking pan to cool, then cut into squares.
